properties.name: Verify Single Employment Process
properties.documentation: Validate the  applicant's employment and income for an employer

properties.name: Init Single Employer Verification
Set Final Values
Update Method Details
Verify By Fax, Email or Mail
Set Unable to Verify Reason
Init Constants
Calculate SLA and Callback

fields.name: summary
fields.expression: Applicant must work with ${dodportallabel} to provide verification report

nextCondition.rightValue: Not found via Secretary of State
No matched result returned from 3rd party
Account not configured for fulfillment via The Work Number

fields.name: script
fields.implementation: var taskName = "QC Transcribed values from " + task.getExecution().getVariable("employerName") + " for " +  task.getExecution().getVariable("applicantName"); task.name = taskName;task.getExecution().setVariable("currentTaskName",  "qc-transcribe");
fields.expression: var taskName = "QC Transcribed values from " + task.getExecution().getVariable("employerName") + " for " +  task.getExecution().getVariable("applicantName"); task.name = taskName;task.getExecution().setVariable("currentTaskName",  "qc-transcribe");
